title: Report: Material You-esque dynamic colors will soon be a requirement of Android 12
content:
According to a new report, Google may be requiring makers of phones and tablets on Android 12 to include a dynamic color system like used for Material You on Pixel phones.

more…

The post Report: Material You-esque dynamic colors will soon be a requirement of Android 12 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google may be requiring makers of phones & tablets on Android 12 to include a dynamic color system like used for Material You on Pixels.
